divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were standing on our front porch when I noticed a bright light in the sky moving quickly to the east.....I pointed it out to my wife and and she immediately saw it.....the craft(?) made no noise and was out of sight in under four seconds.......it was flying low and appeared to be heading downward....the houses acroos the street blocked further view......the craft had red and blue lights and was surrounded by a white glow....
Summary: We saw craft(?) moving quickly in an easterly direction low over town
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around April 1st 2006
